thread.title: Lamar Odom had track marks, cocaine in system, report says
thread.title_full: Lamar Odom had track marks, cocaine in system, report says

author: Charles Curtis | For NJ Advance Media
title: Lamar Odom had track marks, cocaine in system, report says
text:
Comments 
Ex-NBA star Lamar Odom, who was found unconscious at a Nevada brothel on Tuesday night and was reportedly in a coma at a Las Vegas hospital, also had track marks on one of his arms and cocaine in his system, according to a "hospital witness" who spoke to TMZ . 
PLUS: Ex-Knick J.R. Smith, Lil Wayne think Odom died 
Doctors apparently said the fluid in Odom's lungs came from the use of crack cocaine. 
Another TMZ report said an MRI revealed Odom suffered "multiple strokes" and that he's on dialysis because he's in kidney failure. 
There was potential good news, however, according to Rev. Jesse Jackson, who visited the former Knicks forward and had this to say, via The OC Register's Bill Oram: Jesse Jackson: "Doctors felt he is much better off today than he was yesterday. At least there is some responsiveness now." — Bill Oram (@billoram) October 14, 2015 
— Bill Oram (@billoram) October 14, 2015 
Jackson: "He's not talking. He's got tubes running out. But we felt inspired by his presence, we had prayer." — Bill Oram (@billoram) October 14, 2015 
TMZ refuted Jackson's take and had sources who said Odom "remains unconscious and unresponsive."
